name: wtm-worktree-manager
description: WTM (WorkTree Manager) desktop UI for managing git worktrees

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run typecheck:renderer && npm run build:renderer && npm run copy-static
scripts.dev: node scripts/ensure-node-pty.cjs && npm run build && ELECTRON_DISABLE_SANDBOX=1 ELECTRON_DISABLE_GPU=1 electron . --disable-gpu --disable-software-rasterizer
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && PW_TEST_WORKER_TEARDOWN_TIMEOUT=0 playwright test
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
